name: 2048 of Noppon
description:
Tokyo Tower of image character "Noppon brother" appeared become a 2048 game!
Let's put out more and more attracted Noppon siblings of the same number!
And stuck to it will aim at Noppon of 2048 a lot!

■ Rule
- You can slide (swipe) up, down, left and right.
- Number goes up stick Rururoro each other of the same number.
- If even one Rururoro becomes a number of goal is clear.

(C) TOKYO TOWER

■ Material use
This game lets me use the material for the next site.
